name: A Pacific Halloween
description:
You are a pacific ghost chased by evil pumpkins. Do your best to avoid their spits and "kill" them as only a pacifist would do.

controls: WASD or arrows for movements

Developed in ~6h for the jam https://itch.io/jam/saturday-jam-2

Credits:
art: ai-assisted with midjourney (https://www.midjourney.com/home/)
music: https://freesound.org/people/szegvari/sounds/595713
